author: Vincent Wood
title: Coronavirus cases reach 1m worldwide with more than 50,000 deaths
description: Cases double in space of eight days to bring global infections to six figures
content:
More than a million people have been diagnosed with coronavirus in the four months since it was first observed in China in December, officials at Johns Hopkins have confirmed.
The first 100,000 cases were reported in around 55 days and the first 500,000 in 7… [+992 chars]
